author: 0x5283
content: Hey everyone, quick question (was planning on asking in the cat herders discord, but I'm unable to locate that discord) - From a exchange/infrastructure perspective at one point would say its a good idea to start testing withdrawals for staking on our side? Would you say once the public testnet is out, we should start looking at testing withdrawal and put available engineering resources than or would you recommended any earlier? Would this Friday's community call discuss this?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: The public testnet should be out pretty soon, and that would be the best way to start testing imo. We've decided not to encourage testing on the devnets in order to keep the noise for the teams as low as possible during the rapid iterations

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: There will be a big announcement of the withdrawal testnet

author: 0x5283
content: Thank you for the reply ğŸ™  - We'll be on a look out for the withdrawal testnet announcement and start our work then. Keep up the great work ğŸ”¥
